title: Heavy Machinery Transportation in South India
desc: Specialized transport for heavy machinery across South India.
overview: We provide comprehensive heavy machinery transportation services across South India. Our fleet is equipped to handle the most demanding loads with precision and safety. From construction sites to industrial plants, we ensure your machinery arrives on time and in perfect condition.

services.title: Inter-state Machinery Transport
services.description: Seamless transport of heavy machinery between Karnataka, Tamil Nadu, Kerala, and Andhra Pradesh.

services.title: Construction Equipment Moving
services.description: Relocation of excavators, loaders, and pavers to construction sites.

services.title: Industrial Plant Relocation
services.description: Complete turnkey solutions for moving entire industrial plant machinery.

title: ISRO ODC/OWC Transportation
desc: Trusted partner for ISRO ODC/OWC critical transportation needs.
overview: We are proud to be a trusted partner for ISRO, handling Over Dimensional Cargo (ODC) and Over Weight Cargo (OWC) with the highest level of security and precision. Our specialized teams are trained to transport distinct and critical aerospace components.

services.title: Aerospace Component Transport
services.description: Specialized handling and transport of sensitive aerospace components.

services.title: High-Security Logistics
services.description: Logistics operations with enhanced security protocols for sensitive cargo.

services.title: Route Survey & Planning
services.description: Detailed route surveys to ensure safe passage for ODC/OWC across varied terrains.

title: Metro Rail Transportation
desc: Logistics solutions for metro rail components and infrastructure.
overview: Supporting the growth of urban infrastructure, we provide specialized logistics for Metro Rail projects. From rolling stock to concrete segments, we deliver the components that build the city's lifelines.

services.title: Rolling Stock Transport
services.description: Transportation of metro coaches and engines.

services.title: Concrete Segment Logistics
services.description: Transporting pre-cast concrete segments for tunnels and viaducts.

services.title: Rail Equipment Handling
services.description: Moving track-laying machines and other rail infrastructure equipment.

title: Freight & Shipyard Transportation
desc: Seamless freight and shipyard transport services.
overview: Our shipyard transportation services bridge the gap between ports and inland destinations. We handle heavy marine equipment, ship parts, and general freight with efficiency and care.

services.title: Marine Engine Transport
services.description: Transporting massive marine engines and propulsion systems.

services.title: Ship Block Moving
services.description: Moving large ship hull blocks and sections within shipyards.

services.title: Port-to-Door Logistics
services.description: Seamless logistics from the shipyard to the final inland destination.

title: Power Transformer Transportation
desc: Safe handling and transport of heavy power transformers.
overview: Transformers are the heart of the power grid, and we treat them with the utmost care. Our team uses specialized hydraulic trailers and skidding systems to transport and position heavy power transformers.

services.title: High Voltage Transformer Transport
services.description: Safe transport of 400kV+ transformers.

services.title: Substation Equipment Logistics
services.description: Moving circuit breakers, reactors, and other substation gear.

services.title: Foundation Positioning
services.description: Precision unloading and positioning of transformers onto their foundations.

title: Airport Project Transportation
desc: Dedicated logistics for airport construction and equipment.
overview: We support the aviation industry by transporting airport infrastructure, ground support equipment, and construction materials for airport expansion projects.

services.title: Aerobridge Transport
services.description: Logistics for passenger boarding bridges.

services.title: Runway Construction Equipment
services.description: Moving pavers and specialized runway laying machinery.

services.title: Baggage Handling Systems
services.description: Transporting conveyor systems and baggage scanning units.

title: Flat Bed Trailer
desc: Versatile flat bed trailers for diverse cargo requirements.
overview: Our fleet of flatbed trailers is the backbone of general logistics. Ideal for steel, pipes, container cabins, and other non-standard loads that require open-top or side loading.

services.title: Steel & Pipe Transport
services.description: Transporting long steel beams and pipes.

services.title: Container Cabin Moving
services.description: Relocating site offices and portable cabins.

services.title: General Cargo
services.description: Versatile transport for pallets, crates, and machinery parts.

title: Cranes and Diggers
desc: Rental and transport of cranes, diggers, and excavators.
overview: Beyond transport, we offer solutions for the equipment itself. We handle the mobilization and demobilization of heavy cranes and diggers to and from project sites.

services.title: Crane Mobilization
services.description: Transporting mobile and crawler cranes to sites.

services.title: Earthmover Transport
services.description: Moving excavators, backhoes, and bulldozers.

services.title: Rental Assistance
services.description: Logistics support for equipment rental companies.

title: Heavy Machinery Transportation
desc: Expert transportation for all types of heavy industrial machinery.
overview: A broad category covering all our industrial machinery transport services. If it's heavy and needs to move, we have the solution.

services.title: Manufacturing Plant Relocation
services.description: Moving production lines and heavy presses.

services.title: Mining Equipment Transport
services.description: Transporting crushers, screeners, and dump trucks.

services.title: Oil & Gas Equipment
services.description: Logistics for rigs, pipes, and refinery modules.

title: Containers Transportation
desc: Secure and efficient container transport services.
overview: Efficient movement of standard and high-cube containers. We ensure timely delivery of your containerized cargo from ports to warehouses and vice versa.

services.title: 20ft & 40ft Container Transport
services.description: Standard container movements.

services.title: Reefer Container Logistics
services.description: Power-supported transport for refrigerated containers.

services.title: Open Top Container Handling
services.description: Special handling for over-height cargo in open top containers.

title: Windmills Transportation
desc: Specialized fleet for transporting windmill components.
overview: Wind energy projects require some of the most specialized transport in the world. We have extendable trailers to handle turbine blades and heavy-duty axles for nacelles and towers.

services.title: Turbine Blade Transport
services.description: Using tele-trailers to transport long windmill blades.

services.title: Nacelle & Hub Transport
services.description: Heavy transport for the power generating components.

services.title: Tower Section Logistics
services.description: Moving large diameter tower sections.

title: Heavy Lift Transportation
desc: Solutions for extremely heavy and oversized lifts.
overview: When the cargo is too heavy for standard transport, our Heavy Lift division steps in. We engineer solutions using modular hydraulic axles to distribute weight and ensure safe passage.

services.title: Modular Axle Operations
services.description: Using Goldhofer/Cometto type axles for super heavy loads.

services.title: Project Logistics Management
services.description: End-to-end management of heavy lift projects.

services.title: Jack & Slide Operations
services.description: Positioning heavy equipment where cranes cannot reach.

title: Trailer Transportation
desc: Comprehensive trailer transport for general and specialized loads.
overview: A versatile fleet of trailers including low-beds, semi-low beds, and high-beds to cater to diverse cargo dimensions and weights.

services.title: Low-Bed Trailer Services
services.description: For tall cargo and heavy equipment.

services.title: Semi-Low Bed Transport
services.description: Ideal for over-dimensional machinery.

services.title: High-Bed Trailer Logistics
services.description: Standard platform trailers for general cargo.
